data.name: How many pigs are in the pen?
data.description:
# Task
Write a function, given the number of boars, the number of sows, the number of seconds, set every 10 seconds a boar and a sow will give birth to a piglet (a boar can only give birth to a piglet with a sow each time), the pig will not die, if the piglet is the first singular birth, the piglet will be changed to a boar after 5 seconds, if the piglet is the first even number of times the piglet is born, the piglet will be changed to a sow after 5 seconds, to return to the results: in the past after the given number of seconds, the number of total pigs

# Example
```javascript
getPigsCount(5,5,600): 49
```

# Write at the end
<big>Hey! Please start coding</big>

<small>Please give this kata a good feedback,very thanks</small>
